main.name: Yulius Setyawan
main.bio: Hi, I'm a fresh graduate from Buddhi Dharma University. I'm 22 years old and always eager to learn and take on responsibility in my work. My passions lie in web development, data analysis, and computer networks, and I'm excited to dive into these areas and grow my skills. I have a strong will and am determined to make a difference in the tech industry.
